db.title: Arjuna
db.body: Duty before all else, but my heart is troubled.

db.title: Krishna
db.body: Inaction in action, that is true wisdom.

db.title: Draupadi
db.body: Justice will prevail, but the cost is heavy.

db.title: Yudhishthira
db.body: Truth is my path, though it is fraught with suffering.

db.title: Bhishma
db.body: I am bound by my vows, yet the burden is great.yes

db.title: karna
db.body: to become the best archer in the world and be loyal to my friend who helped me when i was low and gave me my own kingdom
